Service Details: - Offers a community inclusion program for adults with a focus on vocation training as well as community based recreational activities, designed to meet the needs of those attending by offering a variety of different activities that allows people to make choices regarding their daily activities- Offers regular flyer delivery to downtown businesses, bulk mail service, map folding, packaging various items, and poster delivery- Clients chose from a wide variety of other activities as well, such as fishing, hiking, golfing, bowling, concerts in the park, community theater, tours, houseboat trips, ceramics, letter writing (to movie stars for autographs), and computer skills
